content: Write the story for the next Episode. In this one, Gunther and Blake enter an expresso contest hosted by an advertising company. The contest is luckily hosted in Central Park. We find out this was done by Chandler's firm and he makes a very brief cameo. They find out they need a third participant for their Central Perk booth to act as a hype man. Blake convinces to hire Angie who is currently out of work. Gunther hesitates but agrees. Make the episode funny and include all the details
